alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 12:40AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rock, southeastern Brown and northeastern Blaine Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1240 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Rose, or 18 miles north of Brewster, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bassett, Raven, Duff, Pony Lake, Sybrant, Jones Lake, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area and Johnsons Corner. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 156 and 182. Highway 20 between mile markers 254 and 263. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
